segments.text: I see the woman so focused on that plate, she seems blissfully unaware of the chaos unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills over the sink like a cascading waterfall, and yet she doesn’t flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical, really, watching her dry dishes while the puddle grows at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easy it would be for her to slip if she took just one wrong step.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, on the other hand, are full of mischief; their excitement is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's something reckless about the boy on that wobbly stool, stretching over to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder how he feels, balancing there—it must be thrilling and terrifying at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
